pullRequest.title: [Enhancement] Result view
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Improve the visual presentation of feedbacks.
Description


Feedback items are now displayed based on their type (Test Case / SCA Issue / Manual Feedback) and their credits.
Feedback items show their credits, if they have some.
Students do not see the test case names and have no distinction between automatic and manual Feedback. (All is labeled 'Feedback')
Instructors see test case names, positive test cases and have a distinction between test case and manual feedback. (Labeled either Test Case or Tutor)
A score bar is added on top of the feedback, showing achieved points and deductions
A 'Preliminary' badge is shown if the result is of type Automatic, because of potential hidden test cases.

Steps for Testing

Check the feedback view for different exercises and both as student and instructor. The feedback items should be shown as described above.

Test for a Programming Exercise without manual feedback.
Test for a Programming Exercise with manual feedback.
Test for the other exercise types that the results and feedbacks still display correctly.

Test Coverage

result-detail.component.ts: 94.44% stmts
Screenshots


Student View

Instructor View

nodes.bodyText: Now we have both the SCA and the manual feedback with score 0 in yellow. I think this is okay for now. If we encounter some misunderstandings from the students side, we can adjust it in a follow up  :)
